channel.title: [Resolved] As Psychic, got converted, but stayed Psychic
channel.description:
####What happened?
I was converted to Black Rose, but stayed Psychic. Afterwards I was unable to use my abilities or chat with Black Rose at night.
####What was SUPPOSED to happen?
I was supposed to be converted to the Illusionist.
####Steps to reproduce:
I am assuming have a Mastermind convert another Psychic in a 8 Player game.
####Comments:
Picture if it helps: https://gyazo.com/bbf616a61c450302ef38dbdbe9929ef7
